name: Zhizhuo Z.
short_description: Zhizhuo Z. is a professional working at IBM with connections to Stanford University. They are focused on building at the intersection of Generative AI and 3D experiences, and have previously served as a Lead TA for AI4ALL at CMU.
long_description:
Zhizhuo Z. is a professional currently working at IBM who has connections to Stanford University. Their work focuses on the intersection of Generative AI and 3D experiences, indicating expertise in advanced artificial intelligence and immersive technology development. They maintain a personal website at zhiz.dev where they likely showcase their projects and research.

In June-July 2022, Zhizhuo served as a Lead Teaching Assistant for AI4ALL at Carnegie Mellon University, demonstrating their commitment to AI education and mentorship. With 520 followers and over 500 connections on LinkedIn, they have established a significant professional network in the tech and AI community.

While their LinkedIn profile doesn't provide extensive details about their specific roles or educational background, their association with IBM and Stanford suggests a strong technical foundation and involvement in cutting-edge AI research and development.
